00045 #include <vector>

00047 namespace SimSite3D{
00048 
00049   typedef enum{
00050     LIGAND_FIRST,
00051     PROTEIN_FIRST,
00052   }prot_lig_order_t;
00053 
00055   class ExternalScoringFunction{
00056   public:
00058 
00063     ExternalScoringFunction(std::string cmdline);
00064 
00066     virtual ~ExternalScoringFunction() {;}
00067 
00069     bool fail() const { return a_fail; }
00070 
00072 
00080     virtual bool score(std::string prot_path, std::string lig_path, 
00081                        std::vector<my_float_t> *scores) = 0;
00082 
00084 
00089     virtual void sf_names(std::vector<std::string> *names) = 0;
00090 
00091   protected:
00093 
00099     bool run(std::string prot_path, std::string lig_path);
00100 
00101     bool a_fail;              
00102   private:
00103     std::vector<std::string> cmdline_toks;
00104     std::vector<std::string>::const_iterator prot_str_iter;
00105     std::vector<std::string>::const_iterator lig_str_iter;
00106 
00107   };
00108 }
